<title level="1" right="Action">[Barbed Quills](/Actions.aspx?ID=733) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 123 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency** once per day

**Trigger** You are hit with an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) strike or a strike with a non-[reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) melee weapon.

</column>

---

You break off quills in your attacker's flesh. You deal 1d8 piercing damage to the triggering creature ([basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.) On a critical failure, the creature also takes 1d4 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) as your quills hook into its flesh. At 3rd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, this damage increases by 1d8 and the persistent piercing damage increases by 1.
name: Barbed Quills
